BasicInfo.short: Livingly Media is an online publisher owning lifestyle and entertainment news sites.

Products.name: LonnyMag
Products.description: Lonny Magazine is an online home decor publication that focuses on lifestyle and home decor.

Products.name: Zimbio
Products.description: Zimbio is an online site offering entertainment news, celebrity photo collections, movies, TV, music, and polls for pop culture enthusiasts.

Products.name: StyleBistro
Products.description: StyleBistro combines up-to-the-minute editorial coverage with the largest collection of runway photos and celebrity looks anywhere online.
